name: Air Strike - Free Jet Fighter
description:
Battle it out in the skies for total air control! Fly a fighter jet against the best in the world, shoot down enemy jets and defend the nation for freedom!

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D cockpit and controls!
- Superb battlefields and air combat!
- Missiles, bombs, machine guns and more!

This is a realistic war simulation. Fly your plane through a storm of missiles and bullets into the war zone! Strike your enemies out of the sky! America needs its best pilots! Good luck captain!

DOWNLOAD AND FLY TODAY!
